mapper.select: select m.member_seq as idx , m.member_id , m.email , m.mobile , m.member_nm , t.team_nm , STRING_AGG(CAST(r.role_nm AS VARCHAR), ',') as roles from admin.member m inner join admin.team t on m.team_id = t.team_id inner join admin.member_role mr on m.member_seq = mr.member_seq inner join admin.role r on mr.role_seq = r.role_seq where m.use_yn = 'Y' group by m.member_seq, m.member_id, m.email, m.mobile , m.member_nm, t.team_nm
